select message_info.id,message_info.subject, message_info.message, message_info.user_id, user_info.id, user_info.phone, user_info.password, user_info.avatar_url, user_info.nickname, user_info.status,message_info.create_time from message_info left join user_info on user_id=user_info.id where message_info.is_deleted=0 AND message_info.message like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by create_time desc
